summary: Moving into a beach house involves Lynn Markham in mystery, danger, and romance with a beach boy of dubious motives.
cast: Joan Crawford|Jeff Chandler|Jan Sterling|Cecil Kellaway|Judith Evelyn|Charles Drake|Natalie Schafer|Stuart Randall|Marjorie Bennett|Nan Boardman|Ed Fury|Helene Heigh|James Hyland|Judy Pine|Jack Reitzen|Romo Vincent
keywords: seduction|murder suspect|based on play|balboa beach|widow of las vegas gambler
title: Una mujer en la playa
